description: Your country is negotiating a major trade agreement with several nations.

subscenarios.statement: The proposed trade agreement would open your markets but provide access to larger foreign markets.
subscenarios.leftAction: Push for more protections for domestic industries

subscenarios.statement: Labor unions are protesting against the trade agreement, fearing job losses.
subscenarios.leftAction: Address their concerns with labor protections in the agreement
subscenarios.rightAction: Emphasize the long-term economic benefits for all

subscenarios.statement: A key negotiating partner is demanding access to sensitive industries in exchange for their market access.
subscenarios.rightAction: Allow limited access with regulatory oversight
